So, after about a million different crack downloads, reading through hundreds of pages of forum posts, i'm glad to say i finally got it working.

I did i clean install, that included uninstalling Ubisoft Game Launcher. Then once installed, run AC3SP.exe (Its in the chosen install directory) as an ADMIN. THis is critical, as it will not work if started normally.

Here's what i did for it to work for me, its taken hours I had every problem, so this is worth reading if you keep getting stuck on the key part or even the "lost" save file. I used http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7840551/Assassins_Creed_3_UPDATE_1.01_and_CRACK.ONLY_1.01  -Use it to update it, then paste the uplay.exe from its crack folder place it in the ubisoftgamelauncher folder located in program files, paste over the old one. Then make a uplay account if you don't have one, then sign in. Then start AC3, when it asks for the key hit ok, this will only work the very first time you use uplay, the second you close it or it crashes uplay resets itself, so every time you close it you have to copy the crack all over again. If you try hitting "ok" to many times when asked for the key and get the invalid key warning, or you do something like I did (no clue what I really did), then your uplay account gets "temporarily banned". And you have to what like a hour or 2. If you get temp ban, and you create a second uplay account, then your save files wont show up under that account. So I had to wait 2 hours just to continue, I tried making a new uplay account and my saves wouldn't show up. Then my original account was unlocked after about a hour and half, and when I recracked uplay, and signed in with my 1st account, my saves were back finally. I hope this helped some one.
